des:
Add Alexa to your TIS Smart Home for added convenience of whole-home automation through voice control. Simple and intuitive voice commands activate smart home scenes and allow you to control individuals or groups of devices.

The TIS Smart Home Skill supports the full set of Alexa voice commands for controlling lights, thermostats, turn, change channels, control volume, and scenes. even adjust a thermostat quickly and easily by saying “Alexa, set the upstairs temperature to 21 degrees”. When naming scenes, use the room name in cases where it is appropriate. For example, Alexa turns on office lamps.

Get started by adding the TIS Smart Home Skill, authenticating with TIS, and then simply discover your devices. You can also use the Alexa App to create groups of devices like Bedroom or Downstairs by adding several devices to those groups.
